name: A. GNEISS - Metamorfica collection
description:
METAMORFICA
Change and Persistence
A new handmade collection by Studio Fludd
________________________

"An attempt to explain the former changes of the earth's surface, by reference to causes now in operation." Charles Lyell - Principles of Geology, 1830.

A personal journey to the centre of the Earth by travelling across its surface.
Imperceptibly slow transformations and sudden explosions bring substances into four geologically active states of matter.

Gneiss, Marl & Mica, Breccia are subtle and unpredictable necklaces made out of high quality materials, artisanal manufacturing and tireless visual research. 

This is :
A. GNEISS  /  Paesina stone + burgundy & turquoise miyuki beads. Total length 38 cm; stone circa 2 x 2,5 cm. 
___

Limited edition Fall 2013, exclusive online sale.
The jewel comes in a risograph printed origami envelope.

Due to the materials and the techniques used, every piece of the collection is unique and it could be slightly different from the picture.

name: 004 Gelatology - Change and Persistence
description:
#4 / Ephemera & Miscellanea self-publishing collection
by Studio Fludd

Everything melts or nothing changes?
This booklet explores visual and conceptual analogies between ice-cream and geology. Semifreddo cakes, rocky cones and creamy desserts in vibrant colours are models of cause-effect relations and incredibly slow transformations. 
The mixed media technique attempts to evoke the layering of experiences and the metamorphosis of our states of mind. 
 
The text is the result if a cut and paste operation from a milestone of Geology: the Charles Lyell's "Principles of Geology - Being an attempt to explain the former changes of the earth's surface, by reference to causes now in operation", London 1830.

Limited edition of 100 copies. Digital + risograph print / 10 pages of thick ivory paper / 19 x 28,5 cm.
Risograph print by Inuit, Bologna. 

You can find the complete gif of Gelatology here > http://studiofludd.blogspot.it/2013/10/ephemera-miscellanea-4-gelatology.html

name: Gelatology - Risograph Print / 001
description:
GELATOLOGY - 001 Remote Changes

Studio Fludd's new limited signed edition of art risograph prints. 

Everything melts or nothing changes?
This series of illustrations explores visual and conceptual analogies between ice-cream and geology. Semifreddo cakes, rocky cones and creamy desserts in vibrant colours are models of cause-effect relations and incredibly slow transformations. 
The mixed media technique attempts to evoke the layering of experiences and the metamorphosis of our states of mind. 

Printed with soy-based inks on thick ivory paper (300gr/mq) in 3 colours. Size: A3 - 30 x 42 cm. The print will be sent in a sturdy cardboard envelope.

For more about this project, please visit our blog www.studiofludd.blogspot.com and our website www.studiofludd.com.

name: 001 De Fluctibus - Compendium
description:
EPHEMERA & MISCELLANEA is a new self-publishing collection by Studio Fludd. Rich in details, assembled with care. Limited numbered editions for paper addicts.

001 DE FLUCTIBUS - Compendium

This is kind of agile summa of the latest projects; miscellaneous images kneaded, mixed, blended together. FOOD as fil-rouge: secret ingredients, nutritional facts, digestion and other digressions.  Follow us in this lively excursus across crunchy, spongy, foamy, sticky, sparkling visual consistencies. The right zine for Robert Fludd's groupies. 

"The fact is always obvious much too late, but the most singular difference between happiness and joy is that happiness is a solid and joy a liquid."  J.D. Salinger

Risograph printed by Inuit Editions in two colours on different papers; double openable cover; size 13x20cm. Limited edition of 100.

For more about it, visit our blog www.studiofludd.blogspot.com !

name: 002 Vessel
description:
EPHEMERA & MISCELLANEA is a new self-publishing collection by Studio Fludd.

002 VESSEL - Zattere, monotonie, correnti e paratie   /   by Caterina Gabelli

Photography and drawing tell us about: water and wood, sand and bricks, unstable matter, corrosion, floating thoughts, floods, fissures, circulatory system, monotony and discontinuity. Pause. Details, transparency, things that stay.

Risograph printed by Inuit Editions on different papers; double openable cover; size 13x20cm. Limited edition of 50.

For more about it, visit our blog www.studiofludd.blogspot.com !

name: 003 Short History of Both Universes
description:
EPHEMERA & MISCELLANEA is a new self-publishing collection by Studio Fludd.

003 Short HISTORY of BOTH UNIVERSES, vol. 1  /  by Sara Maragotto 

Is it possible to represent the All? The Life The Universe and Everything. Or at least The Much Possible? This zine whispers in your ear some thin fragments and subtle cosmic drawings about this (endless, failing) research. Dreams of pocket size encyclopaedias, seeds, eggs and diagrams of the existence.

Risograph printed by Inuit Editions on different papers; double openable cover; size 13x20cm. Limited edition of 42 (the answer!).

For more about it, visit our blog www.studiofludd.blogspot.com !

name: SF+TFN - Synthesis / Tote bag
description:
Imprevedibili Potenziali Eventi / Unpredictable Potential Events

This is a line of handcrafted merchandise for Teatro Fondamenta Nuove - the contemporary theatre of Venezia, complementary to the visual communication we design for it.
-
Carry all the stuff for your experiments in this sturdy bag, made by heavier weight natural cotton canvas for durability and strength.

Two colour screen print, two colour combinations.
S1 > greyish blue green + coral red 
S2 > greyish blue green + pyjama pink 

Size: 37cm wide x 41cm high x 8cm full side and bottom gusset; handles 23cm. Washable 30°, iron on reverse.


More about > www.studiofludd.com

name: SF+TFN - 1+2+3 / Fan Bag
description:
Imprevedibili Potenziali Eventi / Unpredictable Potential Events

This is a line of handcrafted merchandise for Teatro Fondamenta Nuove - the contemporary theatre of Venezia, complementary to the visual communication we design for it.
-

The super FAN BAG contains:

1. SYNTHESIS / Sturdy tote bag, made by heavier weight natural cotton canvas for durability and strength. (Size: 37cm wide x 41cm high x 8cm full side and bottom gusset; handles 23cm. Washable 30°, iron on reverse.) Choose between two colour combinations: greyish blue green + coral red or greyish blue green + pyjama pink.

+ 
2. ANALYSIS / High-quality rounded-corner Notebook - in DARK BLUE on blue

+ 
3. CATALYSIS / Kit of Pins - with three cute glossy button pins with fun textures and tiny devices. (one-of-a-kind, diameter 3cm each)

= * SPECIAL OFFER *

-

More about > www.studiofludd.com

name: 1. Cicisbeo
description:
Opuscula Miscellanea - Cultivated Variety

A) Cose fino allora non descritte / Things not yet described.
-
1. CICISBEO - Ephemeral and essential in character. Asymmetrically cut rose quartz crystal (about 2,5 cm) on a thin cord of neon yellow (final length 35cm). 

This collection features things to hang around your neck, handmade and in limited edition. Born from an atmosphere of lively decadence and anarchic vitality, harkening back to 18th century Venice, the island of quirks and delights. A celebration of formal exuberance and the eccentric spirit, embracing colours both electric and powdered. Materials that are lightweight and also sumptuous along with echoes of artisanal knowledge combine to produce varied and unusual results.
-
An original StudioFludd's screenprint wraps the jewels in an origami envelope. 
*
Minor variations in shape and colour are due to the manufacturing process. Please note that actual colours may vary from the colour on your screen due to monitor colour restriction.

name: Spedizione veloce - ITALIA
description:
Aggiungi al tuo carrello questo articolo per scegliere l'opzione di spedizione con Raccomandata 1 di PosteItaliane (consegna in Italia in 1 giorno lavorativo). 
Ricorda di inserire il codice FLUDDHOFRETTA al momento del checkout per azzerare ogni altra spesa di spedizione. 


* Stampe escluse * Se avete bisogno di una spedizione tracciabile/veloce per questo articolo, grazie di contattarci.
